root.name: Final Fight One
root.description: A Port of the Super Nintendo version. With All three characters from the Original game: Cody, Guy and Mike Haggar. Besides having All three characters in the same game, what sets it apart from the SNES version, is the addition of the Industrial Area stage, and it's Boss fight with Rolento. Character art was also added into the game, which gave it a bigger story element, With profile shots of players and bosses talking to each other before a battle. This version also had link cable support, which gave you the option of 2 player co-operative play. Extras included, Color swapping, Extra lives, Stage select, rapid bunch and The Alpha versions of Guy and Cody as unlockable characters to play. FUN FACT:Damnd and Sodom Keep their names in this localization.
